content.rendered:
Directed by Josh Gordon. Will Speck

Written by Will Davies. Bernard Waber

Star Javier Bardem(Hector P. Valenti). Scoot McNairy(Mr. Primm). Constance Wu(Mrs. Primm). Brett Gelman(Mr. Grumps). Shawn Mendes(Lyle (voice)). Winslow Fegley(Josh Primm). Sal Viscuso(The Judge). Adam Murray(Lowlife). Don DiPetta(Paramedic). Lyric Hurd(Trudy). Mary Neely(Mary). Yussie Jupiter(Broadway Theatre Goer). Zeb Slone(Tall kid at school). Cora Maple Lindell(Dancer). Joe Gulla(Mailman). Rudie Bolton(Lyle the Crocodile (as Rudie)). Lindsey Moser(Wrestling Coach). Jef Holbrook(Stage Manager). Mac Wells(Show Security Guard). Chloe Camp(Middle School Student). Elijahawon Perrin(Singer). Donald Ome(Assistant Wrestling Coach). Serge Burack Jr.(HOA Member). Danny Salomon(Animal Trainer). Will Frontera(Court Room Spectator). Cate Whitlatch(Prep School Student). Christine Moon(Zookeeper). Niquitta S. Wolfe(Concert Attendee). Donnie Cormier(Security Guard #3). Bethania Ahadu(Broadway Theater Goer). Keiko Bell(Court Spectator (uncredited)). Jonathan Kase Bennett(Broadway Theatre Goer (uncredited)). Kailyn Blanco(Middle School Student (uncredited)). Chloe Childs(Middle School Student (uncredited)). Beverley A. Crick(Committee Member (uncredited)). Al Dollar(Scenic Guy (uncredited)). Lynn Farrell(Pedestrian (uncredited)). Lauren Marie Gordon(Opera Patron (uncredited)). Bob Leszczak(Staring Businessman (uncredited)). Robert Loftus(Subway Commuter / Pedestrian (uncredited)). Melisa Lopez(Theater Patron (uncredited)). Walker O’Duggan(Man in park (uncredited)). Kimi Price Queguiner(Paramedic (uncredited)). Brooke Raymond(Serendipity3 Diner (uncredited)). Bailey Rae Stoneking(Theatre Goer (uncredited)). Michaelle Vilsa(Prep School Girl (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Tarak Ben Ammar. Robert J. Dohrmann. Josh Gordon. Andy Mitchell. Hutch Parker. Benj Pasek. Justin Paul. Will Speck. Kevin K. Vafi. Dan Wilson. Bryan Yaconelli

Production Eagle Pictures. Hutch Parker Entertainment. Sony Pictures Animation
